entry.title: è´­ç‰©å•
entry.content:
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
int money = sc.nextInt();
int n = sc.nextInt();
if(n<=0||money<=0) System.out.println(0);

    good[] Gs = new good[n+1];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int v = sc.nextInt();
        int p = sc.nextInt();
        int q = sc.nextInt();
        Gs[i] = new good(v,p,q);

        if(q>0){
            if(Gs[q].a1==0){
                Gs[q].setA1(i);
            }else {
                Gs[q].setA2(i);
            }
        }
    }

    int[][] dp = new int[n+1][money+1];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int v=0,v1=0,v2=0,v3=0,tempdp=0,tempdp1=0,tempdp2=0,tempdp3=0;

        v = Gs[i].v;

        tempdp = Gs[i].p*v; //åªæœ‰ä¸»ä»¶

        if(Gs[i].a1!=0){//ä¸»ä»¶åŠ é™„ä»¶1
            v1 = Gs[Gs[i].a1].v+v;
            tempdp1 = tempdp + Gs[Gs[i].a1].v*Gs[Gs[i].a1].p;
        }

        if(Gs[i].a2!=0){//ä¸»ä»¶åŠ é™„ä»¶2
            v2 = Gs[Gs[i].a2].v+v;
            tempdp2 = tempdp + Gs[Gs[i].a2].v*Gs[Gs[i].a2].p;
        }

        if(Gs[i].a1!=0&&Gs[i].a2!=0){//ä¸»ä»¶åŠ é™„ä»¶1å’Œé™„ä»¶2
            v3 = Gs[Gs[i].a1].v+Gs[Gs[i].a2].v+v;
            tempdp3 = tempdp + Gs[Gs[i].a1].v*Gs[Gs[i].a1].p + Gs[Gs[i].a2].v*Gs[Gs[i].a2].p;
        }

        for(int j=1; j<=money; j++){
            if(Gs[i].q > 0) {   //å½“ç‰©å“iæ˜¯é™„ä»¶æ—¶,ç›¸å½“äºè·³è¿‡
                dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
            } else {
                dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
                if(j>=v&&v!=0) dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-v]+tempdp);
                if(j>=v1&&v1!=0) dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-v1]+tempdp1);
                if(j>=v2&&v2!=0) dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-v2]+tempdp2);
                if(j>=v3&&v3!=0) dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-v3]+tempdp3);
            }
        }
    }
    System.out.println(dp[n][money]);


}


/**
 * å®šä¹‰ç‰©å“ç±»
 */
private static class good{
    public int v;  //ç‰©å“çš„ä»·æ ¼
    public int p;  //ç‰©å“çš„é‡è¦åº¦
    public int q;  //ç‰©å“çš„ä¸»é™„ä»¶ID

    public int a1=0;   //é™„ä»¶1ID
    public int a2=0;   //é™„ä»¶2ID

    public good(int v, int p, int q) {
        this.v = v;
        this.p = p;
        this.q = q;
    }

    public void setA1(int a1) {
        this.a1 = a1;
    }

    public void setA2(int a2) {
        this.a2 = a2;
    }
}

}

entry.content:
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
while (sc.hasNext()) {
int n = sc.nextInt();
String[] arr = new String[n];
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
String str = sc.next();
arr[i] = str;
}
Arrays.sort(arr);
for (String a : arr) {
System.out.println(a);
}
}
}
}

entry.title: å­—ç¬¦ä¸ªæ•°ç»Ÿè®¡
entry.content:
import java.util.BitSet;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
String line = sc.nextLine();
BitSet bitSet = new BitSet(128);
for (char c : line.toCharArray()) {
if (!bitSet.get(c)) {
bitSet.set(c);
}
}
System.out.println(bitSet.cardinality());
}
}

entry.title: æå–ä¸é‡å¤çš„æ•´æ•°
entry.content:
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
int num = sc.nextInt();
char[] chars = String.valueOf(num).toCharArray();
String str = "";
for (int i=chars.length-1; i>=0; i--) {
if (!str.contains(chars[i] + "")) {
str += chars[i];
}
}
System.out.println(Integer.valueOf(str));
}
}

entry.title: åˆå¹¶è¡¨è®°å½•
entry.content:
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Scanner;
import java.util.TreeMap;

public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
while (sc.hasNext()) {
int next = sc.nextInt();
Map<Integer, Integer> map = new TreeMap<>();
for (int i = 0; i < next; i++) {
int key = sc.nextInt();
int value = sc.nextInt();
if (map.containsKey(key)) {
map.put(key, map.get(key) + value);
} else {
map.put(key, value);
}
}
for (Map.Entry<Integer, Integer> integerEntry : map.entrySet()) {
System.out.println(integerEntry.getKey() + " " + integerEntry.getValue());
}
}
}
}

entry.title: è´¨æ•°å› å­
entry.content:
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) {
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
long num = sc.nextLong();
long k = (long) Math.sqrt(num);
for (long i = 2; i <= k; i++) {
while (num % i == 0) {
System.out.print(i + " ");
num /= i;
}
}
System.out.println(num == 1 ? "" : num + " ");
}
}

entry.content:
import java.util.Scanner;
public class Main{
public static void main(String[] args){
Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
while(sc.hasNext()){
double input = sc.nextDouble();
System.out.printf("%.1f", getCube(input));
}
}
private static double getCube(double input){
double x=1;
double x1 = x - (xxx - input) / (3xx);
while(x - x1 > 0.00001 || x - x1 < -0.00001){
x = x1;
x1 = x - (xxx - input) / (3xx);
}
return x1;
}
}

import java.util.Scanner;
public class Main {
public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
while (sc.hasNext()){
String str=sc.next();
System.out.println(Integer.decode(str));
}
}
}
